Posts.Content: Hi Maxine! Thanks for your reply and advice.  I've just posted the same discussion in chemotherapy group. I have a lot to chat about next onco appointment Sky xXx
Posts.Title: Pain in wrist and arm and restricted movement from elbow after chemo...

Posts.Content: Has anyone experienced this? I was told it could be the way the nurse put the tube in my wrist.  3 weeks in the pain is not as bad only along the vein from the wrist but now I can't straighten my arm from my elbow it's really tight and painful. I've been trying to move it as much as I can but I'm afraid it's still stuck at the elbow. Just wanted to know is this common and what exercises to help get movement back as I'm having another chemo session next week. Oh by the way I had really bad heart burn anyone experience that as it wasn't on my list of side effects
Posts.Title: Pain in wrist and arm and restricted movement from elbow after chemo...

Posts.Content: Thanks Lynn, I called the chemo hotline and saw a dr who gave me pain killers. There was no infection so when I go to my appointment next week before my chemo hopefully they can help with anything I need. Sky xXx
